PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-15992009-09-17,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCBC/Radio-Canada to dispose of the receivables of Stingray Digital Group Inc.
PrecisOrder, pursuant to paragraph 48. (2) (a) of the BROADCASTING ACT, authorizes CBC/Radio-Canada to dispose of the receivables of Stingray Digital Group Inc. and Pay Audio Services Limited Partnership for a consideration in excess of $4,000,000.
AttachmentsAttachment
